# HKMetadataKeyHeartRateEventThreshold

**Global Variable**

A key that records the threshold of high or low heart rate events in beats per minute.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyHeartRateEventThreshold: String
```

## Discussion

The value for this key contains an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] object with count/time units, described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit]. This metadata key is used by [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryTypeIdentifier/highHeartRateEvent] and [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryTypeIdentifier/lowHeartRateEvent] category samples.
